h1_title: How to Unlock the Secret Loong Dragon Bosses
h2_title: How to Get the Loong Scales
content: If you're lucky, you can actually use the First Prince of Flowing Sands to crack the wall for you if you are able to bait him into lunging into the wall. Alternatively, you can use a spirit such as the Wandering Wight Spirit and transform into it to use the head bash and split the wall.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Secret_Loong_Dragon_Bosses.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Secret Loong Dragon Bosses', specifically from the subsection 'How to Get the Loong Scales'.
The content is as follows:
If you're lucky, you can actually use the First Prince of Flowing Sands to crack the wall for you if you are able to bait him into lunging into the wall. Alternatively, you can use a spirit such as the Wandering Wight Spirit and transform into it to use the head bash and split the wall.
